meanings.definition: Having four equal sides and four right angles.
meanings.sent1: The table was foursquare, with each side exactly the same length.
meanings.sent2: The building had a foursquare shape, making it easy to divide into equal sections.
meanings.sent3: The foursquare cake looked perfectly even, almost too perfect to cut into.
meanings.sent4: Her foursquare personality was evident in her straightforward and honest approach.
meanings.sent5: The foursquare garden design created a sense of balance and harmony.

meanings.definition: A game played by two teams of four players each on a square court divided into quadrants.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children enjoyed playing foursquare in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent2: The foursquare match was intense, with each team trying to dominate their quadrant.
meanings.sent3: In the foursquare game, the ball seemed to have a mind of its own, bouncing unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: The foursquare court was a battleground of strategy and skill.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the air as the players competed in a lively foursquare game.
